siteMetadata.title: Matthieu Oger
siteMetadata.author: Matthieu Oger
siteMetadata.description: I am a product manager, developer and designer from France. Co-founder of Pixelnest Studio.

markdownRemark.html:
Myke Hurley:

If [Apple] do not show a first party gaming focused controller [for the new rumored Apple TV], I think that they are not as committed to games as they might think. […]

And it needs to be a controller with buttons on it.

Exactly my thought.

Steredenn would be cool on the alleged Apple TV… but without a dedicated controller, it's a no go.

frontmatter.title: The New Rumored Apple TV — a Gaming Console?

excerptQuote.name: Myke Hurley
excerptQuote.quote: If they do not show a first party gaming focused controller for the new Apple TV, I think that they are not as committed to games as they might think.
